goal.en: To understand the optimal control in terms of the origin/motivation, analysis, and design, covering cross-disciplinary applications
goal.ch: 了解最佳化控制的源起/動機，分析和設計，並涵蓋跨領域應用。

content.en:
- Introduction and background
- linear time-invariant system
- nonlinear time-variant system
- linear quadratic regulator
- state-dependent (differential) Riccati equation
- mathematical fundamentals
- unified nonlinear optimal control
- application: missile guidance
- application: circuit design
- application: robotics
- application: bio-tech (cancer treatment)
- more applications
- Software: LaTeX
content.ch:
- 導論與背景
- 線性非時變系統
- 非線性時變系統
- linear quadratic regulator
- 狀態相關(微分型式)Riccati方程式
- 數學基礎
- 整合型非線性最佳化控制
- 應用: 飛彈導引
- 應用: 電路設計
- 應用: 機器人
- 應用: 生物科技(癌症治療)
- 更多應用...
- 軟體: LaTeX
